properties.entry: SELECT s.relPath FROM Submission s, Submission_AccessTag sa, AccessTag a, Section se WHERE sa.Submission_id = s.id AND sa.accessTags_id = a.id AND a.name = 'Public' AND s.version > 0 AND s.released = true AND s.rootSection_id = se.id AND se.type = 'Study'

SELECT s.id subId, s.title subTitle, s.accNo subAccNo, s.RTime subReleaseTime, u.fullName authorFullName, u.email authorEmail FROM Submission s, User u WHERE s.owner_id = u.id AND s.released = false AND s.RTime BETWEEN :from AND :to AND s.version > 0
UPDATE Submission SET released=true where id = :subId
INSERT INTO Submission_AccessTag values (:subId, 1)
SELECT id, email, secret from User where secret is not null and active = true
SELECT id, accno, released, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version > 0 and (cTime > :sync_time or mTime > :sync_time)
SELECT id, accno, released, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version > 0 and accno = :accno

SELECT s1.accno from Submission s1 WHERE s1.version < 0 and (s1.cTime > :sync_time or s1.mTime > :sync_time) AND NOT EXISTS (select '1' from Submission s2 where s2.accno = s1.accno and s2.version > 0)
SELECT id, accno, title, secretKey, released, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version > 0
SELECT id, accno, released, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version > 0 AND accNo LIKE 'S-EPMC%'
SELECT id, accno, released, title, secretKey, relPath, rTime, cTime, mTime, rootSection_id, owner_id from Submission WHERE version > 0 and id = :submissionId
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from FileAttribute where file_id = :file_id
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from LinkAttribute where link_id = :link_id
select id, url from Link where section_id = :section_id
select name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from SectionAttribute where section_id = :section_id
select id, name, size, path from FileRef where sectionId = :section_id
select id, accno, type from Section where parent_id = :section_id
select id, accno, type from Section where id = :section_id
select at.name from Submission_AccessTag sat, AccessTag at where sat.Submission_id = :submissionId and sat.accessTags_id = at.id
select id, name, value, valueQualifierString, reference from SubmissionAttribute where submission_id = :submissionId
select email from User where id = :user_id
select accNo from Section sec where sec.type = 'Publication' and sec.submission_id = :submissionId
